about_the_game:
Physics-based demolition puzzle game featuring 72 levels of increasing difficulty where you solve each challenge using various explosives.

After placing explosives during the 'Set Phase' you can select four triggers to detonate them during the 'Det Phase'. Strategic thinking and impeccable timing are crucial as you try to avoid collateral damage while completing each level’s objective and maintaining a positive score.

Looking for a new challenge? Complete all 72 levels to unlock the Zero Gravity Campaign where you can experience each level again in zero-g and access a new Anti-Gravity Explosive.

This is Cilithocal's first published game and comments are welcomed!
detailed_description:
Physics-based demolition puzzle game featuring 72 levels of increasing difficulty where you solve each challenge using various explosives.

After placing explosives during the 'Set Phase' you can select four triggers to detonate them during the 'Det Phase'. Strategic thinking and impeccable timing are crucial as you try to avoid collateral damage while completing each level’s objective and maintaining a positive score.

Looking for a new challenge? Complete all 72 levels to unlock the Zero Gravity Campaign where you can experience each level again in zero-g and access a new Anti-Gravity Explosive.

This is Cilithocal's first published game and comments are welcomed!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Game Centric Distro
  • Processor: Single Core 3Ghz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 600 mb Video Memory, capable of OpenGL 3.0
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Game Centric Distro
  • Processor: Multicore 3.5ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1024mb Video Memory, capable of OpenGL 3.0+
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.14 "Mojave"
  • Processor: Single Core 3 Ghz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 600 mb Video Memory, capable of OpenGL 3.0
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10.15 "Catalina"
  • Processor: Multicore 3.5Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1024mb Video Memory, capable of OpenGL 3.0+
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

name: Set 'N Det

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or later
  • Processor: Single Core 3 Ghz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GTX 650 or higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 or later
  • Processor: Multicore 3.5 ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GTX 680 or higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

short_description: Solve puzzles with explosions! Casual 2D puzzle game with 72 levels/puzzles to solve.
